A

ACheckableWordList - Class in it.xabaras.android.acheckablewordlist.widget
This is a simple Android library implementing a (comma) separated word list where each word can be clicked and checked/unchecked.
ACheckableWordList(Context) - Constructor for class it.xabaras.android.acheckablewordlist.widget.ACheckableWordList
 
ACheckableWordList(Context, AttributeSet) - Constructor for class it.xabaras.android.acheckablewordlist.widget.ACheckableWordList
 
ACheckableWordList(Context, AttributeSet, int) - Constructor for class it.xabaras.android.acheckablewordlist.widget.ACheckableWordList
 
ACheckableWordList.OnItemClickListener - Interface in it.xabaras.android.acheckablewordlist.widget
Interface definition for a callback to be invoked when an item in this ACheckableWordList has been clicked.
addWord(String) - Method in class it.xabaras.android.acheckablewordlist.widget.ACheckableWordList
Add a single word to ACheckableWordList

C

clearSelection() - Method in class it.xabaras.android.acheckablewordlist.widget.ACheckableWordList
Set all words in ACheckableWordList as unselected

G

getSelection() - Method in class it.xabaras.android.acheckablewordlist.widget.ACheckableWordList
Get the positions of the selected words
getWordCount() - Method in class it.xabaras.android.acheckablewordlist.widget.ACheckableWordList
Get the number of words in the list
